data.title: Financial Statements (San Miguel)
data.meta_description:
Financial Statements (San Miguel) - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a summary of 3 key points:

1) It presents San Miguel Corporation's consolidated trade and other receivables as of September 30, 2020, which totaled PHP 132.448 billion, with PHP 43.033 billion in receivables over 90 days past due. 

2) It discloses San Miguel Corporation's selected accounting policies for preparing interim consolidated financial statements under Philippine Accounting Standard 34 for the period ended September 30, 2020. 

3) It outlines amendments to Philippine Financial Reporting Standards that San Miguel Corporation adopted effective January 1, 2020, which include updates to references to the conceptual framework and clarified definitions for materiality and what constitutes a business.
